title: Can't click on the shop in-game with left mouse click and i can't PING
body: I've been searching for the past 3 hours and i can't find a solution. Please anyone, HOW TO FIX THIS !?

replies.body:
It's possible your input file has been corrupted and will need a complete reset to resolve this. Let's try that reset with the steps below:

First, you'll want to **log into League** then hop into **a custom game**. *Alt+Tab* out of the match, then navigate to your installation folder, which should be here:

> **C:\Riot Games\League of Legends**

Delete the folder named **CONFIG**

Once you've deleted this folder, leave the custom match you were in, then hop into another to confirm the reset was successful. Let me know if this worked!
